title: DDFP 375: AFC South preview & Hall or Nothing
itunes:title: DDFP 375: AFC South preview & Hall or Nothing
description:
Shek is joined by Mike Robinson and Elliot Harrison to break down the 2015 Seattle Seahawks and some of Mike Rob’s camp memories. The guys then play an edition of "Hall or Nothing" before wrapping up the show in a debate of the AFC South Ifs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
